column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

I reduced the instance sizes of Web Servers, App Servers and DB servers to cope with the new reduced budget. As the responses will be slower, I reduced the data transfer estimatons for VPC, Load balancer and cloudfront calculations
